intro: Helixanthera, commonly known as the spiral flower, is a genus of flowering plants in the family Gesneriaceae. It is characterized by its unique spiral arrangement of petals, which gives it a distinctive and ornamental appearance. They thrive in humid, well-drained environments and require bright, indirect light for optimal growth.
